sentences.sContent: In terms of career advice, the most obvious message is: Focus on jobs and areas of expertise that appear to require humanlike general intelligence.
sentences.sContent_eng: In terms of career advice, the most obvious message is: Focus on jobs and areas of expertise that appear to require humanlike general intelligence.
sentences.sCn: 从职业建议上将，最明显的一点是：关注与那些需要人类总体智能的工作或专业领域。

sentences.sContent: In the articles in Science, Dr. Berger’s team describes novel combinations of apelike and humanlike features in the hand, foot and pelvis of the new species.
sentences.sContent_eng: In the articles in Science, Dr. Berger’s team describes novel combinations of apelike and humanlike features in the hand, foot and pelvis of the new species.
sentences.sCn: 在《科学》杂志文章里，伯格尔博士的研究小组描述这个新物种的手，脚和骨盆方面的似类人猿和似人特征的新型组合。

words.tran: 人文主义的；人道主义的
人类；人道；仁慈；人文学科
人道主义者；人类学者，人文学者；人文主义者
